title: Calculate the Hypotenuse
description: This function computes the length of the hypotenuse of a right triangle given the lengths of the two other sides, X and Y, using the Pythagorean theorem. The result is calculated as the square root of the sum of the squares of the input sides.
name: HYPOT

input.name: X
input.description: The length of one side of the right triangle.

input.name: Y
input.description: The length of the other side of the right triangle.

return_value.description: The calculated length of the hypotenuse.
